summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3000, for the improvement of Hudson Street, from 37th Avenue South to 46th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36139 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
